name: PATCH_user-profile
description:
**This endpoint allows you to update your current profile details.**

Any one or more of the parameters can be updated via the PATCH `/user/profile` endpoint. You must include at least one when you PATCH.

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

address.description: The street address for this user profile.

address2.description: An optional second line for the street address of this user profile.

city.description: The city for the user profile.

company.description: That company that this user profile is associated with.

country.description: Th country of this user profile.

first_name.description: The first name of the user.

last_name.description: The last name of the user.

phone.description: The phone number for the user.

website.description: The website associated with this user.

zip.description: The zip code for this user.

$ul: **address**: The street address for this user profile.
**address2**: An optional second line for the street address of this user profile.
**city**: The city for the user profile.
**company**: That company that this user profile is associated with.
**country**: Th country of this user profile.
**first_name**: The first name of the user.
**last_name**: The last name of the user.
**phone**: The phone number for the user.
**website**: The website associated with this user.
**zip**: The zip code for this user.
